text: Sam Darling (11 March 1852 - 16 May 1921) was a British racehorse trainer. He was a trainer at Beckhampton, Wiltshire and trained two Derby winners, Galtee More and Ard Patrick. He wrote an autobiography titled Sam Darling's Reminisces. ==References== Category:British horse trainers Category:1852 births Category:1921 deaths
title: Sam Darling (jockey, born 1852)
